# llms.txt - AI Search Optimization for Vibecodes.space

# About
Vibecodes.space is a professional web design and development service offering custom websites, responsive design, SEO optimization, and ongoing maintenance.

# Contact
Email: matty@pacmacmobile.com
Phone: (402) 915-1434

# Services
- Custom Web Design: Unique, modern designs tailored to your brand and business goals
- Responsive Development: Mobile-first approach ensuring your site looks perfect on all devices
- SEO Optimization: Built-in SEO features to help your website rank higher in search results
- Maintenance & Support: Ongoing support to keep your website secure, updated, and running smoothly
- Domain Registration: Find and register the perfect domain name for your business

# Pricing
- Basic Website: $2,500 (one-time) - Up to 5 pages, responsive design, basic SEO setup, contact form, 1 month support
- Professional Website: $3,500 (one-time) - Up to 10 pages, custom design, advanced SEO, CMS integration, 3 months support
- Premium Website: $4,500 (one-time) - Unlimited pages, e-commerce features, custom functionality, payment integration, 6 months support
- Basic Maintenance: $150/month - Website hosting, security updates, backup management, basic content updates

# Portfolio Highlights
- PackieAI: AI-powered phone scam protection platform
- VibeCode: AI-powered platform that generates web applications from simple text descriptions
- Omaha Housing Campaign: Community-driven fundraising platform
- Hagen Blacksmithing: North Dakota's master blacksmith creating exceptional ironwork
- P3 Lending: Decentralized peer-to-peer lending platform
- Global Nexus: AI tools and services hub
- NexusMail AI: Database configuration interface
- FinchWire: Substrate Daily - A tiny newswire and daily briefing
- IceStorm: Community Safety Network monitoring interface
- EP Files Analysis: Forensic Analysis of the January 30, 2026 Department of Justice Epstein Files Release
